metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7808 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A content security policy (CSP) "frame-ancestors" directive containingorigins with paths allows for comparisons against those paths instead ofthe origin. This results in a cross-origin information leak of this pathinformation. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 55.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.1+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
